scenario.name: SUBSCRIBE with NOTIFY
scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Event: presence Accept: application/pidf+xml Expires: 60 Content-Length: 0
